Nightstrike:

Nighstrike transformed in his trasmetal hwak mode and with his beak 
and talons attacked Prowl, trying to help MEgatron


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Scyther didn't fire, he sliced :-)
> 
> ::Prowl/Scyther::
> 
> Seeing Megatron's attention on IR now, Prowl flies quickly forward,
> slashing his talons at Megatron's back and biting at his head.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther frowns as his attack misses, and slashes again at Megatron.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Megatron puts on a burst of speed seeing the blasts come at him, 
and
> he
> > quickly levels up about them, also uknowingly avoiding Scyther's
> attack
> > and sending the 25 bullets on to him (hot potato).
> > 
> > He then scans around and sees Switchblade sneaking off. He would
> have to
> > chat with him later about this annoying agenda of his. But more
> > interesting was the Damaged Iron Raptor. He had so wanted to deal
> with
> > her personally, but, he knew to take and opportunity when the 
chance
> > came. He aimed his fusion cannon downwards, and took aim on Iron
> Raptor,
> > and let loose the torrent of pink energy, the blast's power 
pushing
> him
> > higher upwards, as the stream headed straight for Iron Raptor.
